pages.text: The blast furnace is the very first machine you have to craft. It is used to make steel by smelting iron ingots together with coal.

One iron ingot and one coal can be blasted into one steel ingot.
One iron block and nine coal can be blasted into 1 steel block.
Sand can be blasted into an even purer form called quartz dust.
Silica tiles can be blasted by either using quartz sand or minecrafts quartz blocks.
To create heat resistent glass simply put some soul sand into the blast furnace together with some coal.
